name: Isekai Crawler
description:
Hi everyone today I'm glad to launch the first playable version !

This game is  a Dungeon Crawler.

For the moment the game contains :

- Inifni dungeon generation.

- 3 classes ( Wizard, Warrior, Archer ).

- Over 60 different monsters.

- Over 45 items.

- Over 8 spells.

- 2 type dungeon.

This is the first version without Save/Load option and Music.

In the next update I will add:

- More Dungeon type, with more Monsters for each Dungeon.

-Sound and Save/Load option.

-More items and spells.

CONTROLS: (qwerty)

E = Open a chest

Arrows = Deplacement in the Dungeon.

Left click = Use / Action.

SPACE = Attack during a fight.

TAB = Change the spell you wanna use.

M = Zoom the mini-map.

P = View player stats.

Thanks for playing my game.

Note: Dev page: https://hamzalopode.itch.io/isekai-crawler-dev

Goal: Collect 100$ to post my game on steam. Thanks to anyone who support me.

Hamzalopode.
